alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Chemung, southeastern Steuben and northwestern Bradford Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Caton, or 9 miles south of Corning, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Caton, Lindley, Painted Post and South Corning. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 44 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
